title: Don your aprons and fire up the ovens!

replies.body: pantheon has finally reached his true potential {{champion:80}} {{item:3070}}
Like yeast, he has risen to his true potential.{{champion:80}}

No it does not, it just collects ur info to spam u with crap and all you get out of it is a "legit" code that has already been redeemed.

DON'T DO IT

FYI it gives the same code to everyone (ITS EVEN THE SAME CODE IN THE VIDEO!!!):
REP-US-1380-BLTZ8XPFTHT8E6BT
We need Grill Master Yi. His sword is a giant hot dog, his meditation has condiments floating around him, and Wuju Style puts  relish on his sword, and mustard when on cooldown.
Nah, they should've made these skins a full team with Pizza Sivir.
predicted that one
Did they alter his joke for this skin?  I know it's just a 975 skin but c'mon.
His joke is the two baker related lines with the rest removed{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} .

{{champion:80}}: I’m pretty sure that’s a health code violation.

You can tell he has his Food Handling License.
Can't get fed without understanding possible health risks! ;)

This is why I love you guys. Please, never change.... have my upvote.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}  {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Same to you, bb. Don't ever change that beautiful soul of yours. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
true that!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{champion:2}} Beats his meat confirmed.
This is underappreciated.

My skin idea for Bard would have been perfect here.

Passive: Picks up bags of flour or sugar and the Meeps would be gingerbread men.

Q: Slings out a chunk of laffy taffy or gum that sticks people together.

W: Drops an unfinished cupcake. It decorates itself to show that it's finished maxing out the heal potential.

E: This is the only one that has given me issues. You slide through a colorful straw? Could even turn into a milkshake during it like the Snow Day Bard turns you into a penguin.

R: I'm sure most of you have seen this in a cartoon. Jello. Shakes around a bunch but whatever is inside it doesn't move. All I can picture for his ulti is throwing a giant blob of jello at the location and it lands with a satisfying smoosh/wiggle animation, holding everyone inside it in place.

Yeah I couldn't resist. In freaking in love with the jello ult XD.

Just some more spit-balling, for his E:
-Like a gumball machine or something dispensing you
-Some long candy like rolos or starburst or spree or nerd rope (of course something along those lines but not exactly for copyright/advertising troubles and reasons) and you eat it as you go through
*-A giant licorice you twirl through (My favorite idea)
Bard main approves of this

.......This is better than what I was going to write. 

I must work harder.
Hey! I think Riot saw your stories and decided to make their own! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} Keep up the good work!

Would be cool if I did inspire this. 

And I will keep up my work.

EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!

It's lightdragoon88! ^_^ *fangirl squee* Please do write more and grace us with your work! <3
I can't tell if you are lying or not, but either way thanks. :D
You forgot sinful succulence {{champion:25}} . Should be part of collection {{summoner:14}}
She got fired a while back for igniting the cookies a tad too long. :< It's okay though. I think she prefers working alone.
She was their last baker D:

Hehehe not gonna lie, I was definitely channeling my inner Satoshi when working on this. ;)
What I'd like to see is Plumber Pantheon.  Plumber Jax or Plumber Mordekaiser might work also, but it would be great to see Pantheon hurl a lethal toilet plunger and kill an enemy champion with it.
Then {{champion:89}} needs to have a princess skin. {{champion:33}} can settle for the bad guy. And- oh, we aren't talking about Mario?
Omfg "Lethal toilet plunger" XD
*thinks about Daleks*
are you kidding me?  it has to be the Super Noxio Bro's Plumber Darius and Plumber Draven
I have been waiting for this Pantheon skin since Season 2. Thank you rito
